NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Table Tennis USA is a site for finding and reviewing places to play table tennis as well as signing up for memberships and tournaments.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use Table Tennis USA
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Sign up, use the various search features to find places you want to play, suggest new places that you know of, signup for memberships and tournaments, review places you have played at and connect with other users so you know there will be someone to hit with you.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Create an account and use IOS, Android or the website version to utilize all the great features
WELCOME_INTRO: Table Tennis is one of the most rewarding sports to master, so let's start playing!
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the items list by name, state, date, ect...
